item.title: linux
item.description: Windows Subsystem for Linux enable it Enable-WindowsOptionalFeature -Online -FeatureName Microsoft-Windows-Subsystem-Linux restart when prompted (restart later won’t work for Windows 10 [TODO: Version]) terminal for VS Code, Goland, etc. TODO: - use the defult? - other terminals softwares
